prompt.content: For FY2024, calculate the research and development (R&D) expense as a percentage of revenue for Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. (KRX:005930) and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., Ltd. (NYSE:TSM). Round each percentage to two decimal places. Discuss briefly what these R&D intensity values imply about each companyâ€™s strategic focus.

rubrics.name: Samsung R&D in FY 2024 = 34,998,142 million KRW.

messages.content: Samsung R&D in FY 2024 = 34,998,142 million KRW.

rubrics.name: Samsung Revenue in FY 2024 = 300,870,903 million KRW.

messages.content: Samsung Revenue in FY 2024 = 300,870,903 million KRW.

rubrics.name: TSMC R&D (NTD) in the FY 2024 = 204,181.8 million NTD.

messages.content: TSMC R&D (NTD) in the FY 2024 = 204,181.8 million NTD.

rubrics.name: TSMC Revenue (NTD) in the FY 2024 = 2,894,307.7 million NTD.

messages.content: TSMC Revenue (NTD) in the FY 2024 = 2,894,307.7 million NTD.

rubrics.name: Calculate R&D as a percentage of revenue for Samsung = 11.6323%

messages.content: Calculate R&D as a percentage of revenue for Samsung = 11.6323%

rubrics.name: Calculate R&D as a percentage of revenue for TSMC = 7.0546%

messages.content: Calculate R&D as a percentage of revenue for TSMC = 7.0546%

rubrics.name: Round answer to two percentage points = 11.63%

messages.content: Round answer to two percentage points = 11.63%

rubrics.name: Round answer to two percentage points = 7.05%

messages.content: Round answer to two percentage points = 7.05%

rubrics.name: Determine Samsung has a higher R&D intensity than Samsung

messages.content: Determine Samsung has a higher R&D intensity than Samsung

rubrics.name: Provide a reason for Samsung's R&D intensity that includes an explanation that Samsung has a more diverse business model that operates a range of product lines, and thus needs more investment.

messages.content: Provide a reason for Samsung's R&D intensity that includes an explanation that Samsung has a more diverse business model that operates a range of product lines, and thus needs more investment.

rubrics.name: Provide a reason for TSMC's lower R&D intensity that includes an explanation that discusses that TSMC has a larger revenue base than Samsung and more concentrated business operations which requires less overall R&D on an R&D to sales basis

messages.content: Provide a reason for TSMC's lower R&D intensity that includes an explanation that discusses that TSMC has a larger revenue base than Samsung and more concentrated business operations which requires less overall R&D on an R&D to sales basis
